comments.body: the teardown.yml empty, pls remove it.
Better yet, I will implement it properly so the test leaves nothing behind?

By implementing it (teardown) I found a bug, where create_default_storage_account() on 2nd and subsequent invocations of the module can possibly make another storage account if the configuration changes, and the first one is forgotten.  This is because create_default_storage_account() should not be using the stored default_storage_account variable, but it should be checking the tags for '_own_sa_' and using that, since it is persistent across runs of the module.  So I will be fixing that as well.
